p: Upon request, further data including the study protocol will be shared with other investigators for the purpose of replicating procedures and results. Unidentified participant data may not be shared for legal or ethical reasons. Data cannot be shared publicly because participants did not explicitly consent to the sharing of their data as per the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation and the corresponding German privacy laws. Data are available through the Research Ethics Board of Ludwig Maximilians University, Munich, Germany, for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data.
